text.0: i laud agni the chosen priest god minister of sacrifice.
text.2: worthy is agni to be praised by living as by ancient seers.
text.3: he shall bring hitherward the gods.
text.4: through agni man obtaineth wealth yea plenty waxing day by day.
text.6: agni the perfect sacrifice which thou encompassest about.
text.8: may agni sapientminded priest truthful most gloriously great.
text.9: the god come hither with the gods.
text.10: whatever blessing agni thou wilt grant unto thy worshipper.
text.11: that aṅgiras is indeed thy truth.
text.12: to thee dispeller of the night o agni day by day with prayer.
text.14: ruler of sacrifices guard of law eternal radiant one.
text.16: be to us easy of approach even as a father to his son.
text.17: agni be with us for our weal.
